title: CATS
description: Now playing to rave reviews, the 40th Australian Anniversary of Andrew Lloyd Webber's record- breaking musical CATS is coming to the Her Majesty's Theatre from September.

title: Her Majesty's Theatre Guided Tour
description: Discover what makes Her Majesty’s Theatre so inspiring at our guided public theatre tours. Constructed in 1913, The Maj is the only Tivoli theatre façade still standing in Australia.

title: Hong Kong Dragon
description: Adelaide, you couldn’t get enough, so we’ve made it official.

title: Lucky Dumpling Market
description: Everyone’s favourite spring festival hub is back, with delicious food, free entertainment, and fun for the whole family.

title: Films and Fun
description: Screening daily on Saturday 18 and Sunday 19 October at 2.30pm, 4.30pm, and 6.30pm.

title: Free-doom Down Under
description: Get a first glimpse of Free-doom Down Under , a bold new work exploring what it takes to fit in.

title: Searching Blue
description: Walk alongside Singapore’s T.H.E Dance Company in a gentle, profound outdoor performance conceived and created by Founding Artistic Director Kuik Swee Boon, tracing shifting relationships between people, places and passers-by.

title: TUSHAR
description: TUSHAR is a South Asian Australian Indie artist based between Naarm/Melbourne and Kaurna Land/Adelaide.

title: Roméo et Juliette
description: The world’s most iconic love story comes to life in State Opera South Australia's brand-new production of Gounod’s Roméo et Juliette , created, built, and produced in Adelaide for its world premiere season.

title: Moon Lantern Trail
description: Get ready for a magical four days of free family fun at Moon Lantern Trail!

title: V-Pop Vibe: Chi Xê and Changg
LauZone
description: “Where are you from? Where are you REALLY from?”
